criteria: Accuracy in identifying latitude and longitude coordinates
Ability to use coordinates to determine absolute locations
Understanding of the coordinate grid system
Application of knowledge to locations in California and on Earth
descriptions: Unable to identify or incorrectly identifies latitude and longitude coordinates.
Struggles to identify latitude and longitude coordinates, significant errors present.
Identifies latitude or longitude coordinates with frequent errors or confusion.
Identifies both latitude and longitude coordinates with minor errors or inconsistencies.
Accurately identifies latitude and longitude coordinates in most instances.
Consistently and accurately identifies latitude and longitude coordinates.
Unable to use coordinates to determine absolute locations.
Attempts to use coordinates, but struggles to find absolute locations, with significant errors.
Uses coordinates with frequent errors or confusion to find absolute locations.
Uses coordinates with minor errors or inconsistencies to find absolute locations.
Uses coordinates accurately in most instances to determine absolute locations.
Consistently and accurately uses coordinates to determine absolute locations.
Demonstrates no understanding of the coordinate grid system.
Demonstrates a minimal understanding of the coordinate grid system, with little practical application.
Demonstrates some understanding of the coordinate grid system, but struggles to apply it.
Demonstrates a general understanding of the coordinate grid system, with some ability to apply it.
Demonstrates a strong understanding of the coordinate grid system and its practical applications.
Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of the coordinate grid system, including its intricacies and practical applications.
Unable to apply knowledge of coordinates to locations in California and on Earth.
Attempts to apply knowledge, but struggles to locate places in California and on Earth.
Applies knowledge with frequent errors or confusion to locations in California and on Earth.
Applies knowledge with minor errors or inconsistencies to locations in California and on Earth.
Applies knowledge accurately in most instances to locate places in California and on Earth.
Consistently and accurately applies knowledge to locate places in California and on Earth.
